title: Croscarmellose Sodium
productOverview: Croscarmellose Sodium is an internally cross-linked sodium carboxymethylcellulose (NaCMC) used as a superdisintegrant in pharmaceutical formulations. It facilitates the rapid disintegration of tablets and capsules, ensuring quick dissolution of the active pharmaceutical ingredient (API).

specifications.value: Insoluble in water, though it swells rapidly
